item1:
产品替代包装单位基本数据的查询
Query basic article alternative unit data
item2:
可查询所有已下传的产品包装基本数据
Query basic data of all article alternative unit
item4:
SAP下传相关产品包装基本数据
SAP downloads basic data of related article alternative unit
item5:
Article No, GTIN No
Article No, GTIN No
item6:
产品包装基本数据
article alternative unit data
item7:
如果无符合条件的产品包装数据，系统将提示查无产品包装信息
If there is no article alternative unit data that meets the requirements, the system will prompt to check that there is no article alternative unit information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选GTIN No后点选Query查询产品包装基本数据
Enter query conditions or select GTIN No and click Query to query basic data of article alternative unit
